doc:
Pamela Springsteen https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pamela_Springsteen 0 Pamela Colleen Springsteen (born February 8, 1962) is an American actress and photographer. She had a short acting career, and is best known for playing the role of serial killer Angela Baker in Sleepaway Camp II: Unhappy Campers and Sleepaway Camp III: Teenage Wasteland. She had co-starring roles in Dixie Lanes, The Gumshoe Kid, and smaller roles in mainstream films like Fast Times at Ridgemont High, Reckless and Modern Girls. She is now a successful photographer in Los Angeles. She is the younger sister of Bruce Springsteen. Pamela_Colleen_Springsteen ( born February_8_,_1962 ) is an_American_actress and photographer . She had a_short_acting_career , and is_best_known for playing the_role of serial_killer_Angela_Baker in Sleepaway_Camp_II : Unhappy_Campers and Sleepaway_Camp_III : Teenage_Wasteland . She had_co-starring roles in Dixie_Lanes , The_Gumshoe_Kid , and smaller_roles in mainstream_films like Fast_Times at Ridgemont_High , Reckless_and_Modern_Girls . She is now a_successful_photographer in Los_Angeles . She is the_younger_sister of Bruce_Springsteen .
